description: Works Fine. Though eats up lot of internet bandwidth
Very heavy on the CPU. Makes multitasking impossible
Can't redraw the window, it doesn't fit in the screen.
summary: It is just the webapp, but heavy and useless

description: Useless, crashes instantly. I cannot find a commandline command to run so I can at least see the error output when it crashes.

I can't make the window fit into my desktop, part of it is always outside of the visible area. I think it is due to fact that this app scales its main window to whole screen and does not account for any panels, but in the same time does not allows users to resize. Strange decision.
Could you please fix it?
summary: Works almost fine, but has resize issue on Linux

description: When we pass text with quotes or double-quotes and is copied by remote client, the quotes are screwed up.
Application efficace et très bien intégrée. Manque juste la traduction en Français ...
